      static double KBStraightLine.distance(double A, double B, double C, Point p)
      直线方程中
      A = y2 - y1,
      B = x1 - x2,
      C = (x2 * y1) - (x1 * y2)

      Copy from https://blog.csdn.net/ffgcc/article/details/79941512
